}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "8WMPN13..2A1G" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :WiSoC: [[Ralink]] RT3662F @500MHz 2T3R (iNIC) :RAM: ESMT (SDRAM) 54-pin
